text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi WHAT HAVE YOU BEEN DOING SINCE JAN??
JOE, PELOSI AND SCHUMER HAVE THIS CORONAVIRUS ALL OVER WITH!
THEIR ANSWER IS TO KEEP THE LOCKDOWN UNTIL SUMMER OF 2021 OR 2022.
AMERICAN VOTERS WILL REALLY LIKE DECLARING BANKRUPTCY AND HAVING ILLITERATE KIDS.
ARE AMERICAN VOTERS REALLY STUPID
